Header: CEA studying public opinion on Sampur’s environmental impact report (Watch Report)
Content: The Central Environmental Authority says that they have not yet granted approval for the Environmental Impact Assessment report on the Sampur Power Plant . Chairman of the authority, Lal Dharmasiri, stated that the authority has received a considerable amount of public views and a majority of it is in Tamil language. He added that the authority is looking in to those views at the moment and said that they authority will be considering  their opinions before granting approval for the EIA report. The chairman noted that the accepting of the public opinions came to a close on March 31
